title: Jack Greenwood
description: Take a peek into the life of Jack Greenwood from 'The Fire Mage Trilogy' in this never-before-seen prequel to 'Frost Arch'. All new content and information about Jack.Visit Jack's life aged 14 in Frost Arch. Entire story available FREE through: Goodreads, Smashwords, Scribd, and Kate's personal blog, as a gift to my readers.***Recommended reading BEFORE this short story: Frost Arch - Book 1 of The Fire Mage Trilogy***
author: Kate Bloomfield
